channel.title: researchers on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in researchers on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-20
item.description: TikTok Kitchens will bring viral culinary creations to fans (3 minute read) TikTok Kitchens is a new campaign by TikTok and Virtual Dining Concepts (VDC) that will bring TikTok foods to fans in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-06
item.description: Amazon is reportedly working on a smart fridge (2 minute read) Project Pulse is a smart fridge being developed at Amazon that will be able to track inventory and purchase habits, predict what customers need, and have those products delivered.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-13
item.description: Jim Lanzone breaks up with Tinder, swipes right to take the CEO job at Yahoo, Renate Nyborg takes Tinder CEO role (3 minute read) Jim Lanzone, the current CEO of Tinder, has been appointed the new CEO for Yahoo under Apollo Global.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-12
item.description: Here’s everything Samsung announced at its August Unpacked event (3 minute read) Samsung announced four new devices at its August 11 Unpacked event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-22
item.description: This tiny car beat Teslaâ€™s Model 3 in January and February (2 minute read) The Hong Guang Mini EV outsold Tesla’s Model 3 in January and February.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-28
item.description: Tesla Model S refreshed with a radically redesigned interior and 520-mile range (3 minute read) Tesla has unveiled its long-rumored refresh for its Model S sedan.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-14
item.description: Google trained a trillion-parameter AI language model (5 minute read) Generally speaking, the more parameters a machine learning model has, the better it is at its task.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-11
item.description: Apple, Hyundai set to agree electric car tie-up (2 minute read) Hyundai Motor and Apple Inc are planning to sign a partnership deal on autonomous electric cars by March.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-03
item.description: Apple announces November 10 One More Thing event for ARM-based Macs (3 minute read) Apple has announced a third fall media event as expected.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-01
item.description: Google announces the Pixel 5 for $699 (3 minute read) The Google Pixel 5 will be available in eight countries on October 15th, then in the US on October 29th for $699.
